findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds to the team wallet, which can be exploited by setting a high fee to the `buyBackAndHoldWithDecimals` variable.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
ST - Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: OCTD - Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: Contract owner lacks the ability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer user's tokens accumulated from fees collected from the contract by setting a high fee to the `buyBackAndHoldWithDecimals` variable.

findings.title: ELFM - Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: Contract owner cannot increase fees beyond 25%.

findings.title: ULTW - Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds to the team wallet. These funds have been accumulated from fees collected from the contract.

findings.title: MT - Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens

findings.title: BT - Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: BC - Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling.
